questions.text: Has male–male involvement ever been part of your fantasy for this lifestyle?
Who first raised the idea?
How did it first come up?
Your intent when raising it (best fit)
How respectful was your approach?
How persistent were you about it?
Did you frame it as optional and safe to refuse?
His initial reaction
Did you interpret his reaction as…
Have you ever laughed, teased, or used it to “get at him”?

options.label: Yes, it’s part of the kink

questions.text: When teasing happens, it is usually…
Have you ever used it as leverage (e.g., “prove yourself,” “or else”)?
Do you believe he felt pressured at any point?
Do you believe you were pressured by him or by the dynamic to push this?
Does your partner identify as
Does your partner have past male–male experience?
Does your partner consume male–male porn (to your knowledge)?
Do you find male–male contact arousing because… (choose up to 3)
What “type” of MM involvement is/was desired? (choose all)

options.label: No physical contact; verbal roleplay only

questions.text: If you desire a specific act, why that one?
Have you actually tried any MM involvement?
If yes, whose idea in the moment was it?
How consensual did it feel overall?
Your enjoyment of it
His enjoyment of it (your best estimate)
Afterward, his emotional state was usually
Afterward, your emotional state was usually
